source_data.name: VIVA SOUNDS: Majvi Superstar + We are wood
source_data.description:
VIVA SOUNDS 2024 | ALL ABOUT SMILES, SHOWS AND STICKY FLOORS Nov 28-30 Gothenburg, Sweden

••• LINE-UP ••• Motorpsycho (NO) • Los Bitchos (UK)* • Beverly Kills • Kristina Issa • Arvid Nero • Death By Unga Bunga (NO) • Fägring • Maria Jane Smith • Albert af Ekenstam • Emilia Pantić • Vera Sola (US/CA) • BLUAI (BE) • The Family Men • Agitator • Kindsight (DK) • Obstruktion • Lézard (BE) • Elin Wiigh • Sodakill • Paperwing • The Black Wizards (PT) • ior • Karl Vento • Ki! (DK) • Majvi • Ryder The Eagle (FR) • Iskander Moon (BE) • Clutter • Lucy Kruger & The Lost Boys (ZA/DE) • Flypaper (UK) • Knife Girl (FI) • Smag På Dig Selv (DK) • Ronia • Hearts • Fox Womb • Swartzheim (DK) • Misty Coast (NO) • Mary Shelley (US) • Bēdu Brāļi (LV) • The Lilacs (UK) • Nyssa (CA) • Hanna Järver • Good Health Good Wealth (UK) • Eighty Eight Miles (UK) • Jenobi • Leanne Hoffman (CA) • Dylan Robert (UK) • Mud Grief • Aysanabee (CA) • Hilning • Alanna Matty (CA) • Adjua (UK) • Blessings • Fox Paloma (DK) • Merry (DK) • Synvilla • Thus (DK) • Travo (PT) • Ultra Lover • We Are Wood • Edna Million (AT) • Herman Silow • BAST • Hellsongs • Nora Lucia

*The concert with Los Bitchos is a collaboration with Pustervik and Luger. It requires a special ticket; ”3-DAY + LOS BITCHOS”. On sale from Friday April 26, 11am.

••• TICKETS & INFO ••• www.vivasounds.se

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Viva Sounds is your favorite indoor winter party with loads of new music in several different venues in Gothenburg City. One festival wristband gives access to a great number of concerts and sounds. Grab your friends and friends to be and start moving between venues, celebrating live music along with smiles and sticky floors.

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

PLEASE NOTE that different venues have different capacities. So please come early for the shows you really want to attend, or you might find yourself not getting in.

AS A FESTIVAL we reserve the right for changes in the line-up before and during the event. If any changes happen we will announce them as soon as we can and we'll always try to do one better if we have to replace any act that we had booked. Tickets are sold to the full festival or the specific nights and not for any specific artists/bands (if nothing else is specified) and won't be refunded or reimbursed due to changes in the line-up if they occur by incidents beyond our control.
